function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of logical connectors in search may result in missing relevant papers","Impact":"Missed opportunity to capture important research on supply chain operations and COVID-19","Mitigation":"Use a broader set of keywords and phrases to ensure comprehensive search coverage","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Potential bias in search results due to discipline limitations","Impact":"Missing out on interdisciplinary research relevant to supply chain operations and COVID-19","Mitigation":"Consider broadening the scope of disciplines included in the search criteria","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, database administrators","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Incomplete capture of relevant publications due to time limitations","Impact":"Missing out on important research published after the search dates","Mitigation":"Periodically update the search to capture newly published papers","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
